product_name: The North Face Ultra Guide Trail-Running Shoes - Women's
long_description: The North Face Ultra Guide trail-running shoes are built to take on the toughest trails, and feature lightweight construction and a stout, supportive fit to keep feet happy on the trail. Nylon mesh uppers with thermoplastic urethane overlays are flexible, lightweight and durable for breathable, comfortable use on the trail; synthetic leather toe caps. Polyester linings wick moisture away from the feet for all-day comfort. Perforated EVA Northotic&#(TM) footbeds offer lightweight cushioning, and are removable. Dual-density EVA midsoles deliver all-day cushioning and shock absorption; heels feature a stiffened cradle to help center the heel and enhance stabilty. Thermoplastic urethane shank plates add torsional rigidity and protection from uneven terrain. The North Face Ultra Guide trail-running shoes feature aggressive rubber outsoles for dependable traction on uneven terrain.
short_description: The North Face Ultra Guide trail-running shoes are built to take on the toughest trails, and feature lightweight construction and a stout, supportive fit to keep feet happy on the trail.
